StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: Proc2112
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @ID uniqueiden..er, @PersonID uniqueiden..er, @BodyFat decimal(18,4), @Crunches int, @CrunchesPoints int, @Height decimal(18,4), @HipMeasurement decimal(18,4), @MaxWeight decimal(18,4), @NeckMeasurement decimal(18,4), @PullupsOrFlexhangs int, @PullupsOrFlexhangsPoints int, @RunTime decimal(18,4), @RunTimePoints int, @TestDate date.me, @TotalPoints int, @WaistMeasurement decimal(18,4), @Weight decimal(18,4) ) AS
BEGIN TRANSACTION
IF EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM [ACP].[PhysicalFitnessTest] WHERE [ID] = @ID) BEGIN
UPDATE [ACP].[ACP].[PhysicalFitnessTest] SET [PersonID] = @PersonID ,[BodyFat] = @BodyFat ,[Crunches] = @Crunches ,[CrunchesPoints] = @CrunchesPoints ,[Height] = @Height ,[HipMeasurement] = @HipMeasurement ,[MaxWeight] = @MaxWeight ,[NeckMeasurement] = @NeckMeasurement ,[PullupsOrFlexhangs] = @PullupsOrFlexhangs ,[PullupsOrFlexhangsPoints] = @PullupsOrFlexhangsPoints ,[RunTime] = @RunTime ,[RunTimePoints] = @RunTimePoints ,[TestDate] = @TestDate ,[TotalPoints] = @TotalPoints ,[WaistMeasurement] = @WaistMeasurement ,[Weight] = @Weight WHERE [ID] = @ID
END ELSE BEGIN
INSERT INTO [ACP].[ACP].[PhysicalFitnessTest] ([ID] ,[PersonID] ,[BodyFat] ,[Crunches] ,[CrunchesPoints] ,[Height] ,[HipMeasurement] ,[MaxWeight] ,[NeckMeasurement] ,[PullupsOrFlexhangs] ,[PullupsOrFlexhangsPoints] ,[RunTime] ,[RunTimePoints] ,[TestDate] ,[TotalPoints] ,[WaistMeasurement] ,[Weight]) VALUES (@ID ,@PersonID ,@BodyFat ,@Crunches ,@CrunchesPoints ,@Height ,@HipMeasurement ,@MaxWeight ,@NeckMeasurement ,@PullupsOrFlexhangs ,@PullupsOrFlexhangsPoints ,@RunTime ,@RunTimePoints ,@TestDate ,@TotalPoints ,@WaistMeasurement ,@Weight) END
-- Rollback the transac.on if there were any errors IF @@ERROR <> 0 BEGIN -- Rollback the transac.on ROLLBACK TRANSACTION -- Raise an error and return RAISERROR ('Error occurred while performing the change.', 16, 1) RETURN END
-- Rollback the transac.on if the number of rows changed does not meet our expecta.on... IF @@ROWCOUNT > 1 BEGIN -- Rollback the transac.on ROLLBACK TRANSACTION -- Raise an error and return RAISERROR ('An unexpected number of rows were changed.', 16, 1) RETURN END
-- If we reach this point, the commands completed successfully, commit the transac.on COMMIT TRANSACTION
